title: Just Received a Reward???
body: I just "Received a Reward" as  I logged into League of Legends... Looking all over for where/what it would be.. but no luck. Any Help..?

replies.body: I found out it were honor summoner icons or something like that. 3 of it were added to my icon list last time I logged in.
you might have gotten the new lunar revel emblem if you hadn't already!
Same here, message pops out twice when i log in, but I don't know where to check it out.

You're getting old backlogs of notifications for content you've already received in the past.  Per our [ticket banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-) currently up, the updated client enabled toasts for testing so you may see a few old notices.  Nothing new received, I'm afraid!
